definitions.definition: Used transitively when followed by it : to behave like a minx , that is, in a flirtatious and impudent manner .
To make (someone) like a minx; ( intransitive ) to become like a minx.

main_definition: ( ambitransitive ) Used transitively when followed by it : to behave like a minx , that is, in a flirtatious and impudent manner .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To make (someone) like a minx; ( intransitive ) to become like a minx.
